TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaRouter/UserRouteInfo extends Android.Media.MediaRouter/RouteInfo

Docs.summary: Information about a route that the application may define and modify.

remarks.para: Information about a route that the application may define and modify. A user route defaults to RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE and RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_FIXED.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Media.RemoteControlClient RemoteControlClient { get; set; }
member this.RemoteControlClient : Android.Media.RemoteControlClient with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieve the RemoteControlClient associated with this route, if one has been set. -or- Set the RemoteControlClient responsible for reporting playback info for this user route.
Docs.value: the RemoteControlClient associated with this route

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Retrieve the RemoteControlClient associated with this route, if one has been set.
Property setter documentation:
Set the RemoteControlClient responsible for reporting playback info for this user route.
If this route manages remote playback, the data exposed by this RemoteControlClient will be used to reflect and update information such as route volume info in related UIs.
The RemoteControlClient must have been previously registered with AudioManager#registerRemoteControlClient(RemoteControlClient).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The description of the route, or null if none.
Docs.summary: Set the user-visible description of this route.

remarks.para: Set the user-visible description of this route.
The route description describes the kind of destination represented by the route. It may be a user-supplied string, a model number or brand of device.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Defines at what volume the playback associated with this route is performed (for user feedback purposes).
